comments:
Check a recent consolelog from JUnit tests ... if you don't mind waiting for the 20 megs or so to download. 

There's ton of log messages. 

Not sure, some might be related to headless/activity/workbench mis-match, after moving to RC2?

Chuck or Kosta, can you please triage and put in right component, if it should be. 

And, I'm not sure ... but some might be related to running on windows? Or running the tests with JRE 1.5? 

See logs in any "continuous" build since weekend ... but heres a direct link to 
one such example.  

http://download.eclipse.org/webtools/committers/drops/S-1.5RC2-200604300227/consoleLogs.php
This had to do with the use of the UI mode for headless environments.  This has been resolved and fixed for the 050306 WTP 1.5 RC2 build.
